message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DM

Reasoning: The paper deals with the entropy rate preservation and higher order lumpability of Markov chains, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT) and data structures (cs.DS). The use of combinatorial criteria and the characterisation of strong k-lumpability suggest that the paper may also be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the sparse setting mentioned in the abstract hints at the possibility of the paper being related to data mining (cs.DM).
